section.title: Installing the SmartProxy from the Console
section.para: The server comes with one SmartProxy version already available. It can also be installed on an ESX Server version 3.0.2, 3.5 or 4.

important.para: Contact Red Hat before installing a new SmartProxy on an ESX Server.

listitem.para: On ESX, SSH (Secure Shell) must be enabled. This is usually port 22.
300 MB free disk space to install and run the SmartProxy.
The host must already be in the VMDB either by discovery or manually. See the Insight Guide for information on discovery.
